metadata.description: The Space Rover Project is a celebration of space exploration and proceeds go towards raising awareness of space mission in the past , present or future.  To be clear the website Marslatest.com nor any of our content is associated with any space agency.  The Dead Rover Club artwork is science fiction-inspired fantasy artwork.  Any resemblance to actual events, devices, or real-world space missions is purely coincidence.
metadata.name: Space Rovers #1
